title: How New Observations Affect Probability

next.title: Evaluating the Trend in Impact Probability

content: Astronomers have now ruled out 2000 of the possible 3000 orbits initially calculated. Of the remaining 1000 possible orbits, 10 orbits show the asteroid hitting Earth.

question.title: Question #1
question.label: What is the new probability for this asteroid hitting Earth?

question.title: Question #1
question.label: How did the addition of more observations affect the total number of possible orbits and the probability of an impact happening?
